title: Correlation between hysteroscopic features and specific microbial species in women with chronic endometritis
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Vassilis Kapetanios, Maria Lampraki, Georgios Georgoulias, Stavros Kasdaglis, Stylianos Kliafas, Nikolaos Gkavra, Maria Xountasi, Vassilis Tsilivakos, Michail Leventopoulos
